channel.title: Miscellany on Xin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellany on Xin's Blog

item.title: /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\ DuoDuo /ᐠ–ꞈ–ᐟ\
item.description: DuoDuo is a very cute kitty, he is my partner, my all tenderness, and the fluffy dream in my life!

item.title: My Two Queens
item.description: I love insect, especially the ants. I have two ant farms.

item.title: ▼(´ᴥ`)▼ 两只名叫「狗」的狗 ▼・ᴥ・▼
item.description:
The word dog does not look like a dog, walk like a dog, or woof like a dog, but it means “dog” just the same.
[Steven Pinker, The Language Instinct]
